Key Arguments: The bill will degrade public trust in government and media.
The bill's authoritarian approach will decrease trust and foster disunity.
The exemption for government-authorized content is unfair and undemocratic.
The proposal is reminiscent of a Soviet-style regime, not suitable for Australia.
Freedom of speech is a fundamental right in a democratic society.
Notable Quotes: This proposed bill to combat 'misinformation and disinformation' must be wholly rejected.
This is the kind of proposal that someone might expect under a Soviet-style regime. Not in Australia.
Freedom of speech is a right for every human in a democratic society - a cornerstone of liberty.
